downloadDescription: The Windows Phone 8.1 Update Emulators package adds additional emulator images to an existing installation of Visual Studio 2015 or Visual Studio 2013 Update 2 or later. With this update installed, you can create and test apps that will run on devices that have Windows Phone 8.1 Update.
detailsSection:
The Windows Phone 8.1 Update Emulators package adds the following to an existing installation of Visual Studio 2015 or Visual Studio 2013 Update 2 or later:
  • Windows Phone SDK 8.1 Update
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update WVGA 4 inch
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update WVGA 4 inch 512MB
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update WXGA 4.5 inch
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update qHD 5 inch
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update 720p 4.7 inch
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update 1080p 5.5 inch
  • New Windows Phone Emulator 8.1 Update 1080p 6 inch
systemRequirementsSection:
Visual Studio 2015
Visual Studio 2013 Update 2 or later
installInstructionSection: Ensure that you have Visual Studio 2015 or Visual Studio 2013 Update 2 or later installed. Click the Download button for WindowsPhone81SDKUpdate1.exe, then select the option to Run, and follow the instructions that appear.
